entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Lincoln
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 03:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: ENE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers or drizzle. Fog patches developing early this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
